events.comment:
Warning

This example is outdated. Please consider opening "Space Asteroids" instead:
https://gdevelop.io/game-example/free/space-asteroids
set background to black
change start game button color on mouse over
change the scene when the start game button is clicked

Warning

This example is outdated. Please consider opening "Space Asteroids" instead:
https://gdevelop.io/game-example/free/space-asteroids

initialize global values
variables are declared in the variables editor but their value is initialised here
so if you change these values in the variables editor, it is not going to have any effect, you need to change the values here

Initialize timers
player_shoot_timer is used when shooting projectiles
engine timer is used when creating the engine particles
Check if the game is running on mobile or PC, in case it is NOT mobile, hide the touch controls
set background color to black
create player object from external event

initialize player values
the variables are declared in the varaibles editor but their value is initialised here
so if you change these values in the variables editor, it is not going to have any effect, you need to change the values here

initialize asteroid values
the variables are declared in the variables editor but their value is initialised here as currently expressions can not be used in the variables editor
so if you change these values in the variables editor, it is not going to have any effect, you need to change the values here
Create some large asteroids
make sure the asteroids and player are not colliding
display player life on the screen
Larg Asteroid
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction at random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
bullet is in collision with asteroid, create 2 medium asteroid and delete the larg asteroid and the bullet
create some debrish
create 2 medium asteroids
play explosion sound
Medium Asteroid
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction at random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
bullet is in collision with asteroid, create 3 small asteroid and delete the medium asteroid and the bullet
create some debrish
create 2 small asteroids
play explosion sound
Small Asteroid
slowly rotate asteroids to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
set asteroid position in case it is outside the screen
bullet is in collision with asteroid, create some debrish, delete the small asteroid and the bullet
play explosion sound
Debrish
slowly rotate debrish particles to random direction
move asteroid to random direction ar random speed
slowly fade out
delete debrish once the opacity is low
Engine Particle
slowly rotate engine particles to random direction
move engine particles to random direction at random speed
slowly fade out
delete engine particle once the opacity is low
Player
change opacity of player based on if it destroyable or not
if player is not destroyable, make it destroyable after few sec
rotate player using the keyboard
rotate player using the on-screen buttons if the layer is visible (the layer is visible only if the game is running on a mobile device)
move player using the keyboard
stop thruster sound if played and after play thruster down sound once
play thruster sound
create engine particles
move player using the touch controls, the touch controls are visible only if the game is running on a mobile device
stop thruster sound if played and after play thruster down sound once
play thruster sound
create engine particles
constantly apply force on the player ship to make it move
set player position in case it is outside the screen
shoot using the keyboard
create bullets
play shoot sound
shoot using the on-screen button, the button is visible only if the game is running on a mobile device
create bullets
play shoot sound
destroy player if colliding with asteroid
play explosion sound
if player life > 0, and no debrish is present, respawn player
Player debrish
If player doesn't exist, move player debrish
End game
If player life = 0 or number of asteroids = 0, wait few seconds and go to game over screen
set background color to black
If the restart game text is clicked, go back to the game scene
change color of restart text when the mouse is over the text
create player
set player destroyable to false, so at the beginning the player can not be destroyed
